news_title: Bitnomial Becomes First CFTC-Regulated Exchange To List XRP Under Federal Oversight
news_subtitle: XRP gains federal approval for spot trading and collateral use under CFTC rules

news_title: Dogecoin Approaches Critical Monthly Support Level
news_subtitle: Dogecoin nears its monthly Ichimoku cloud support, a key technical level. Analysts highlight a potential long-term trend break if support fails. Read original article on coinwy.com

news_title: Dogecoin ETF Trading Volume Hits Record Low Since Launch
news_subtitle: Dogecoin News Monday's total value traded for U.S. spot DOGE exchange-traded funds dropped to $142,000, the lowest figure since the products launched. SoSoValue data shows the decline from late November, when daily trading occasionally exceeded $3.23 million. Total value traded m...

news_title: Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund Uplisted on NYSE Arca
news_subtitle: Bitwise uplists its $1.25 billion crypto fund to NYSE Arca, allocating 90% to top assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and XRP. Read original article on coinwy.com

news_title: 3 Altcoins Gaining Big Interest Ahead of Holidays: Chainlink, Dogecoin, and Monad
